'''[[Hugh Grant]]''' is a British actor. His career spans two decades, with 15 of those years spent as an international star since 1994. He has received a [[Golden Globe Award]] and a [[British Academy Film Awards|British Academy Film Award]]. His films have collectively grossed more than $2.4 billion worldwide.{{cite news | first=Anthony | last=D'Alessandro | title=Englishman who grossed B.O. | page= | publisher=''[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]'' | date=2002-12-16 | accessdate=2007-09-11 }} The following are his [[film]] and [[television]] credits. ==Film== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 100%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !
